TALK_XA_009_NO_ITEM_02_XMAS2010
君へのクリスマスプレゼントは綿菓子屋に渡しておくって言ってたよ。訪ねてみてはどうだい？
너에게 줄 크리스마스 선물은 솜사탕 가게에 전해주라고 하던데, 한번 가보는 게 어때?
They said they would pass your Christmas present to the cotton candy shop. Why don’t you check it out?
They said they would pass your Christmas present to the cotton candy shop. Why don’t you check it out?
They said they would pass your Christmas present to the cotton candy shop. Why don’t you check it out?
Ils ont dit qu'ils transmettraient ton cadeau de Noël au magasin de barbe à papa. Pourquoi ne pas aller y jeter un œil ?
Sie haben gesagt, dass sie dein Weihnachtsgeschenk an den Zuckerwattestand übergeben würden. Warum schaust du nicht mal vorbei?
Hanno detto che avrebbero passato il tuo regalo di Natale al negozio di zucchero filato. Perché non dai un'occhiata?
Dijeron que pasarían tu regalo de Navidad a la tienda de algodón de azúcar. ¿Por qué no lo chequeas?
他們說會把你的聖誕禮物交給棉花糖店。你不妨去看看？
